info.senderName: Southern California Seismic Network (TriNet) operated by Caltech and USGS
info.headline: EQ 3.4 Imperial County CA - PRELIMINARY REPORT
info.description: A minor earthquake measuring 3.4 on the Richter scale occurred near Brawley, California at 8:53 PM Pacific Daylight Time on Wednesday, June 11, 2003. (This is a computer- generated solution and has not yet been reviewed by a human.)

area.areaDesc: 1 mi. WSW of Brawley, CA; 11 mi. N of El Centro, CA; 30 mi. E of OCOTILLO (quarry); 1 mi. N of the Imperial Fault
